A light sleeping bag that will keep you warm and dry when you need to rest. Be sure to pick a safe spot with a possible escape route.
 
%c[0,204,0,51]WARNING:
 
%c[0,170,170,170]Sleeping in the open may attract predators. Does not protect from radiation.
